The relationship between America's urban & rural regions is a symbiotic one; we thrive when we work together. While negotiations were tough, it's refreshing to see Congress work together in a bipartisan fashion to get something done for the American people. Let's keep it going.

Some other highlights of the bill include:
- Expands rural broadband infrastructure
- Helps producers weather the current trade war
- Provides more certainty to farmers during a volatile farm economy

I'm proud to say that there were absolutely no cuts to #SNAP benefits, meaning no one will be kicked off the program. Also, through administrative modifications, we were actually able to save $1 billion that will be reinvested into nutrition assistance programs.

This week I voted to support the bipartisan #FarmBill18. You can find my full statement on the bill here: https://cleaver.house.gov/media-center/press-releases/congressman-cleaver-votes-in-favor-of-the-2018-farm-bill …
